item.title: FAQ Fixes
item.description: Back to Home Summary If you ever encounter some f**k-ups while building your blog (or something similar) and you can’t find the solution online, come look here. Hugo doesn’t get much traction so it’s hard finding actual solutions :( The TRUE FAQ regarding fixes. Make sure to look at the date though. This might not be so updated. FAQ: A theme’s layout might override your home page. To counter that, just make an index.
